title: The One Where We're Back on Tour
description:
Bob and Monet are back on tour together with no shortage of stories to share! The two talk Lil Nas X run-ins, living on a bus, and cannibalism.
Get your favorite self-pleasure product with 20% off at https://www.lovehoney.co/SiblingRivalry with our PROMO CODE: RIVALRY20
Go to MasterClass.com/RIVLARY for 15% off MasterClass.
See Monét and Bob on tour this fall by going to bobandmonet.com !!
Want to see exclusive Sibling Rivalry Bonus Content? Head over to www.patreon.com/siblingrivalrypodcast to be the first to see our latest Sibling Rivalry Podcast Videos!
@BobTheDragQueen
@MonetXChange
